sentence.Network_en: The agency will make travel arrangements for you. Alternatively, you can organize your own transport.
sentence.Network_cn: 旅行社将为你安排旅行，或者你也可以自己安排交通工具。

sentence.Network_en: Allow about eight hours for the drive from Calais. Alternatively, you can fly to Brive.
sentence.Network_cn: 从加来开车去，要留出大约8小时的时间。或者，你可以坐飞机前往布里夫。

sentence.Network_en: You could, alternatively, hang onto it in the hope that it will be worth millions in 10 years time.
sentence.Network_cn: 或者，你也可以留着它，指望10年以后它能值个几百万。

entry.def: You use alternatively to introduce a suggestion or to mention something different to what has just been stated.

example.ex: Allow about eight hours for the drive from Calais. Alternatively, you can fly to Brive.
example.tran: 从加来开车去，要留出大约8小时的时间。或者，你可以坐飞机前往布里夫。

means.word_mean: 1. in place of, or as an alternative to;

sentences.sentence: "alternatively we could buy a used car"

auth_sentence.content: Dr Lyons may alternatively take on a corporate job.
auth_sentence.res_content: Dr Lyons may alternatively take on a corporate job.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Dr Lyons may alternatively take on a corporate job.

auth_sentence.content: This same inherited liability can alternatively manifest as a learning disorder.
auth_sentence.res_content: This same inherited liability can alternatively manifest as a learning disorder.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This same inherited liability can alternatively manifest as a learning disorder.

auth_sentence.content: Alternatively, the light conversion effect could act as a sunscreen.
auth_sentence.res_content: Alternatively, the light conversion effect could act as a sunscreen.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Alternatively, the light conversion effect could act as a sunscreen.
